Title: 營業活動之現金流量－間接法Cash flows from (used in) operating activities, indirect method
繼續營業單位稅前淨利（淨損）　Profit (loss) from continuing operations before tax
本期稅前淨利（淨損）　Profit (loss) before tax
調整項目　Adjustments
收益費損項目 Adjustments to reconcile profit (loss)
折舊費用 Depreciation expense
攤銷費用 Amortization expense
透過損益按公允價值衡量金融資產及負債之淨損失（利益） Net loss (gain) on financial assets or liabilities at fair value through profit or loss
利息費用 Interest expense
利息收入 Interest income
採用權益法認列之關聯企業及合資損失（利益）之份額 Share of loss (profit) of associates and joint ventures accounted for using equity method
處分及報廢不動產、廠房及設備損失（利益） Loss (gain) on disposal of property, plan and equipment
不動產、廠房及設備轉列費用數 Property, plan and equipment transferred to expenses
處分投資性不動產損失（利益） Loss (gain) on disposal of investment properties
逾期未領董監酬勞轉列其他收入 Other revenue, overdue compensation of board and directors
其他項目 Other adjustments to reconcile profit (loss)
收益費損項目合計 Total adjustments to reconcile profit (loss)
與營業活動相關之資產／負債變動數 Changes in operating assets and liabilities
與營業活動相關之資產之淨變動 Changes in operating assets
強制透過損益按公允價值衡量之金融資產（增加）減少 Decrease (increase) in financial assets at fair value through profit or loss, mandatorily measured at fair value
應收票據（增加）減少 Decrease (increase) in notes receivable
應收帳款（增加）減少 Decrease (increase) in accounts receivable
其他應收款（增加）減少 Decrease (increase) in other receivable
存貨（增加）減少 Adjustments for decrease (increase) in inventories
預付費用（增加）減少 Decrease (increase) in prepaid expenses
其他流動資產（增加）減少 Adjustments for decrease (increase) in other current assets
其他營業資產（增加）減少 Decrease (increase) in other operating assets
與營業活動相關之資產之淨變動合計 Total changes in operating assets
與營業活動相關之負債之淨變動 Changes in operating liabilities
合約負債增加（減少） Increase (decrease) in contract liabilities
應付票據增加（減少） Increase (decrease) in notes payable
應付帳款增加（減少） Increase (decrease) in accounts payable
其他應付款增加（減少） Increase (decrease) in other payable
其他流動負債增加（減少） Adjustments for increase (decrease) in other current liabilities
淨確定福利負債增加(減少) Increase (decrease) in net defined benefit liability
其他營業負債增加（減少） Increase (decrease) in other operating liabilities
與營業活動相關之負債之淨變動合計 Total changes in operating liabilities
與營業活動相關之資產及負債之淨變動合計 Total changes in operating assets and liabilities
調整項目合計 Total adjustments
營運產生之現金流入（流出）　Cash inflow (outflow) generated from operations
收取之利息　Interest received
支付之利息　Interest paid
退還（支付）之所得稅　Income taxes refund (paid)
營業活動之淨現金流入（流出）Net cash flows from (used in) operating activities
投資活動之現金流量Cash flows from (used in) investing activities
取得按攤銷後成本衡量之金融資產　Acquisition of financial assets at amortised cost
處分子公司　Proceeds from disposal of subsidiaries
取得不動產、廠房及設備　Acquisition of property, plant and equipment
處分不動產、廠房及設備　Proceeds from disposal of property, plant and equipment
存出保證金增加　Increase in refundable deposits
存出保證金減少　Decrease in refundable deposits
取得無形資產　Acquisition of intangible assets
取得使用權資產　Acquisition of use-of-right assets
處分投資性不動產　Proceeds from disposal of investment properties
預付設備款增加　Increase in prepayments for business facilities
投資活動之淨現金流入（流出）　Net cash flows from (used in) investing activities
籌資活動之現金流量Cash flows from (used in) financing activities
短期借款增加　Increase in short-term loans
短期借款減少　Decrease in short-term loans
應付短期票券增加　Increase in short-term notes and bills payable
應付短期票券減少　Decrease in short-term notes and bills payable
存入保證金增加　Increase in guarantee deposits received
存入保證金減少　Decrease in guarantee deposits received
租賃本金償還　Payments of lease liabilities
發放現金股利　Cash dividends paid
非控制權益變動　Change in non-controlling interests
籌資活動之淨現金流入（流出）　Net cash flows from (used in) financing activities
匯率變動對現金及約當現金之影響Effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents
本期現金及約當現金增加（減少）數Net increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents
期初現金及約當現金餘額Cash and cash equivalents at beginning of period
期末現金及約當現金餘額Cash and cash equivalents at end of period
資產負債表帳列之現金及約當現金　Cash and cash equivalents reported in the statement of financial position
